website_summaries.verdict: Unless you need a slimline, bare-bones camera, steer clear of the FH5 and get one of the many more pleasing options in the Lumix compact range.
cons: Blown-out highlights and lacklustre image quality
Few features compared to other cameras in this price bracket

customer_reviews.title: So Far very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only owned this camera for a day. i owned a LUMIX 10 MP camera and an 8. The 8 died on me, so I decided to upgrade. I was not crazy about the rechargeable batteries, but i bought two spares and I intend to buy a car charger as well. This camera works nice, it is smaller in size than my other two LUMIX. What I like best about LUMIX is the LEICA lense. This camera takes nice close ups and has decent zoom features.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a really nice canon but decided to buy my husband a camera of his own so he didnt have to lug my big one around when he wanted to take photos during travelling. Have had it over a year now and still in great shape. Works great and takes good photos too. One of the better digital cameras weve owned and being small with 16.1 MP is awesome. Easy photo tansfer to computer. Easy to figure out camera settings too.
customer_reviews.author: cnagoyer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because I needed a new point and shoot. It is really easy to use and comes with a rechargable battery which is nice. it is pretty small and easy to transport. i am no expert by any means when it comes to a camera, but this is very easy to use and takes nice pictures. it is so easy, my 12 yr old is always 'borrowing" it. Guess what she is getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: W. Panozzo

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my mom and she let me use it when i was living in asia for a few months. i took thousands of pictures. a really great point and shoot camera. very small and sleek as well. the flash worked fine and all the other features were great. i never had any problems with this camera what so ever. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jehuty101

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a year now and it works reasonably well. I had an old Kodak w/ 3MP that finally gave up the ghost. Got this one. Fits well in my pocket. Takes reasonably good photos, but not great ones, even on max MP. Not even as good as my old Kodak, but it's a handy camera and works well for a tag a long pocket camera.
customer_reviews.author: markrine

customer_reviews.title: Good, Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 16.1 Digital Camera was worth its price. I bought it for $98. It is very small and able to fit in my pocket easily. The camera takes pictures with super good quality. An SD card and a carrying case was not included in the package, but that was okay since I already had my own. I have heard from other reviews that said the camera had a Mega O.I.S error after a period of time. I haven't gotten that error yet, but I will inform you if I do.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Have had a Lumix in the past & passed it to our son. We love all the features of the new one as much as the old one. Easy to use, very good value, received in a timely manner in good condition, & would not hesitate to recommend this product offered by Amazon to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Em Ay

customer_reviews.title: First Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: In that this is my first point and shoot, I don't have antything to really compare this camera with. I have other cameras, however. I read the reviews on the Panasonic and felt that for the money it was worth a try.(16.1 MP!) I am accustomed to printing my pictures. Those printed using the Panasonic are far less than desirable for me; grainy. They look alright in the camera if that's the only record you are looking for. I guess for the money, I didn't make a big mistake. But, if I had a way to try before I buy, I would not have bought!
customer_reviews.author: Elbert

customer_reviews.title: I Forgot To Send It Back
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the camera to take on a trip and when I got home it had stopped working. Battery is good. I got busy and forgot to send it back. Now it's past 30 days. I believe now I'm stuck with an useless lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi-Q

customer_reviews.title: good shots
customer_reviews.text: It's a great one! You have to learn really well the functions to get the most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vini M.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you're shooting in good light.
customer_reviews.text: This camera's pretty good, but does not shoot well in low light, and the macro does not have a very good depth of field. For the amateur photographer that's just looking for a decent but inexpensive camera, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: CinnamonIcetail

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for General Use (Traveling, fun, etc)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera with only 3 days before going on a trip to china. Friend recommended it based on reviews online and it's turned out to be a great general camera for all your needs. I'm not a fancy camera user, but I am active and enjoy spur of the moment shots and action shots, food shots, etc. It has provided good quality photos and other fun "scene" modes for the general user. Good load time, quality photos, and functionality. I've used fujifilm in the past and had no problems, and this camera is also good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: The photos and video that this little came produces is outstanding! Better than my mothers digital SLR camera. She is actually jealous! I do wish the zoom was a little better though and low light videos are extremely grainy, but overall, a GREAT camera! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a previous Lumix which was given away as a gift. I thought this camera was going to be bigger like my old one, but I am very impressed with it. It is smaller, so it's easier to handle, the pictures are very good, it's easy to use and I have no complaints at all. For the price I paid for this camera, I don't think I could have done better purchasing a higher end camera. I would recommend this to anyone who is not a photographer by trade!
customer_reviews.author: Brian ORourke

customer_reviews.title: PANISONIC LUMIX DMC-FH5 DIGITAL CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NO PHOTOGRAPHY EXPERIENCE BUT I AM NOW TAKING VERY GOOD PICTURES. IT IS EASY TO USE, THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE WELL WRITTEN AND UNDERSTANDABLE. I RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO ANYONE WHO WANTS TO TAKE GOOD QUALITY PICTURES.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product was what I expected and very good quality to recommend them all very good product when I can come back to buy
customer_reviews.author: excellent..

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice camera. Its night view is beautiful. Pictures are crisp. When I use it in the night the pictures are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dedzi

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera, it takes beautiful pictures and it's super compact so you can carry it with you very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, compact digital camera, with many useful features. Photos are clear and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: I adore this camera!
customer_reviews.text: After much thought and research I decided to go with this camera and I'm so glad I did! Light weight and takes GREAT pics!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Risinger

customer_reviews.title: fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital camera and I couldn't be more pleased. Very easy to use and so small yet so power packed. I recommend it to anyone in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: keith roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: CAMERA WAS PURCHASED FOR WORK RELATED PHOTO'S. WE HAVE A COLLISION REPAIR BUSINESS AND THE CLARITY OF THE PHOTO'S IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great little camera, which is what I wanted!! It takes really good pictures, it is easy to operate, it is easy to carry around, and it has alot of options for a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This camera has such clarity in the pics it takes. I bought it for my husband who is electronic challenged, he has had no problems figuring it out. I will be buying me one asap.
customer_reviews.author: truiiluv

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This camara is by far better than the Nikon Coolpix and the odak Easyshare I previously had. It's tiny, beautiful, the screen is surprisingly big for such a thin, small camara. The pictures, wow, sharp and crystal clear. It's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Agent007

customer_reviews.title: Expecting New, but got used/opened
customer_reviews.text: The camera I bought was supposed to be new, but the packaging of the box clearly showed it had been opened and taped over several times including both masking tape and clear packaging tape. The box had some damage to it and looked to be smashed. The mailing envelope was padded with some bubble wrap, but the box was loosely positioned in there and offered almost no buffer to collapse. I didn't open the camera box, and am expecting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I take a lot of pictures of my animals and need something that doesn't pause. Great pictures, great settings. I'm so glad I bought this. It was a replacement for the coolpix camera I had - this one is SO much better!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Lumix failed to deliver
customer_reviews.text: I will express here much dissatisfaction from this DMC-FH5 Panasonic Lumix and also from my other Lumix, the FZ40. Both I bought on Amazon. Both failed to do the job they were build to do.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A small camera that takes big quality pictures. Very easy to set up and use. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jcarlomb

customer_reviews.title: vacationer
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on vacation. It was easy to use and took great pictures. It was small enough to slip into a pocket or handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use & so compact that it works perfectly for my needs. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ronw

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for his birthday. He loves it. It's just the right size and the right color for him. The pics are amazing. It's quick and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very easy to use camera and takes great pictures. I use it all the time including work. The auto focus is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 5
customer_reviews.text: Exactly a replacement for my old one. Delivered in 4 days, Excellent 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: Marshall M Carr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Lumix and this one really disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: the camera is easy to use and holds a great charge. but the pictures taken are never sharp. 16 mp seems more like 8.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: good!!!
customer_reviews.text: a very good camera with cute accessories, the only thing I did not like was that the box arrived quite tired, but then the camera on the maximum....!!
customer_reviews.author: Aylin

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed by this camera and don't know why it got such high ratings. I bought it to use for my birthday and it totally failed on me. Even after trying all the different settings, the picture quality was horrible. It was very grainy and the pictures often came out blurry. The tones were very orange and it was the worst camera to use in night or indoor settings. Save your money and don't get this camera.
customer_reviews.author: ja2kattack

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 FH5 

Panasonic LUMIX FH5
The ultra-compact 16.1 megapixel LUMIX DMC-FH5 features newly-developed retractable, high-quality 28mm wide-angle LEICA DC lenses with a 4x optical zoom. With the new retractable lens, the LUMIX FH5 has approximately 20% slimmer profile than its predecessor, while maintaining exceptional performance. LUMIX DMC-FH5 also record 1280 x 720p High Definition (HD) video. 

Venus Engine VI
The high-speed, high-performance Venus Engine VI is incorporated in the DMC-FH5 to enable the recording of beautiful images with higher quality signal processing including the Intelligent Resolution technology. An advanced noise reduction system in the Venus Engine VI applies noise reduction (NR) to luminance noise and chromatic noise separately. As a result, beautiful images with minimal noise can be reproduced all the way up to ISO1600 high sensitivity at full resolution for beautiful night shots or dimly lit indoor shots. 





iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode
When you don't know which mode will give you the best shooting results, or when a sudden photo opportunity pops up and you don't have time to change any settings, simply choose the iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode and let the camera do it all for you. You just choose the iA Mode, aim at your subject, and shoot. Six detection and correction functions are simultaneously activated to optimize the settings so you get stunning photos every time. In addition, the Intelligent Resolution technology is always activated in the iA Mode which results in clearer and higher image quality in every photo with extended zoom range equivalent to 5x by the Intelligent Zoom.




MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) Shake Detection
The MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer)* in the DMC-FH5 compensates for the blurring caused by hand-shake. Even slight hand-shake movement is accurately detected by a sampling frequency of 4,000 times per second, and compensated to produce sharp, clear images. The Venus Engine VI controls the shifting of the blur-stopping lens with even greater precision to further increase the detection accuracy and correction effect of MEGA O.I.S. It lets you shoot in dimly lit rooms or evening illumination to preserve the mood, and works for macro shots and zoom shots, which are especially susceptible to hand-shake. In short, it lets anybody take beautiful, blur-free shots with ease.

* MEGA O.I.S. is automatically turned on in iA Mode and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode or some Scene Modes. 





Intelligent ISO Control Motion Detection
The Intelligent ISO Control function* in the DMC-FH5 made possible by the Venus Engine VI detects subject movement and automatically adjusts the ISO setting and shutter speed to best suit the movement and lighting conditions. When it detects subject motion, it automatically raises the ISO setting and increases the shutter speed to prevent motion blur. On the other hand, when the subject is still and no movement is detected, it takes beautiful natural photos with a low ISO setting. The Intelligent ISO Control gives you stunning images with ease because there is no need for complicated settings. 
* The Intelligent ISO Control function is automatically turned on in iA Mode, and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode. 





Face Detection AF/AE
The Face Detection AF/AE function*1 detects faces and automatically optimizes the focus and exposure settings. It prevents the blurry faces that happen when the camera focuses on something in front of or behind the subject, and keeps faces from appearing dark when shooting indoors or against the light source. It detects up to 15 faces at a time, making it extremely convenient for group photos. Once the camera detects a face, Face Tracking follows it even when the subject moves around. Plus, the system keeps detection on if a face turns sideways to the camera. The DMC-FH5 is also equipped with Digital Red-eye Correction (Red-eye Removal). The camera takes care of the red-eye effect that often happens when shooting with a flash, to ensure attractive facial expression*2 
*1 Face Detection function is automatically turned on in iA Mode and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode or some Scene Modes.
*2 Digital Red-eye Correction must be turned ON in the menu prior to use.




Intelligent Scene Selector Scene Detection
With the camera in iA Mode, the Intelligent Scene Selector automatically sets the Scene Mode to one of Scenery, Portrait, Macro, Night Portrait*1, Night Scenery or Sunset. The camera judges it from the various detection results such as focusing and brightness level of the circumstance*2. You are free from choosing different settings every time the scene changes when taking images with these frequently used Scene Modes to get beautiful results.
*1 In iA Mode, Night Portrait is not identified when the flash is turned off.
*2 With some subject and shooting conditions, it is just not possible to judge the best shooting details. When this happens, it is recommended that you shoot with the Scene Mode that best suits your purpose.






2.7-inch, 230,000-dot High-resolution LCD
The DMC-FH5 large 2.7-inch LCD features high 230,000-dot resolution Intelligent LCD. It automatically adjusts the brightness in 11 steps according to shooting conditions. This LCD provides sharp, clear images in virtually all shooting situations, ranging from nighttime to bright daylight scenes. And it lets you share the fun of viewing images with family and friends. The High-angle Mode makes the display extremely easy to view from a low viewpoint, for example, when taking photos by raising your hand upward to capture the subject over the crowd. 

Scene Mode
The Scene Mode lets the camera make the optimal settings for you automatically, so anybody can take superb photos with ease. The versatile Scene Mode range, which handles just about any situation and subject type, is a major LUMIX feature. And to make it even simpler to use, the icons and display are designed for easy visibility. The DMC-FH5 lets you store a frequently used Scene Mode setting in the My Scene Mode. 
DMC-FH5 Scene Modes 



LUMIX Image Uploader
The DMC-FH5 gives you a new form of communication by letting you share your photos and movies. All you have to do is checkmark the photos and movies you want to share and connect the camera or SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card to a computer. Uploading automatically starts by simply following the guidance. Facebook can be used for photos and YouTube for movies. You can join these social networking services without having to install any special software. It's easy to share photos and movies on the spot, which means that your friends don't have to wait for you to come back home to see them.

Easy Computer Connection
Select photos and movies on the camera menu.

Upload Photos and Movies
The software is launched after connecting the camera or SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card to a computer.

Share with Your Friends
You can share the URL by e-mail right after the upload!

Built-in Memory 70MB
Take photos even when you don't have an SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card* on hand. The built-in memory holds up to approx. 70MB of image data, which you can later copy to an SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card or computer. You can also copy images from a memory card or computer to the built-in memory, and view them on the LCD anytime you like. In addition to providing extra memory when your memory card fills up, this is a great place to store your favorite photos so you can view them anytime you want.

*SDHC Memory Cards and SDXC Memory Cards can be used only in equipment that is compatible with their respective formats.
*If the computer being used does not support SDXC Memory Cards, a message prompting you to format may appear. (Doing so will cause recorded images to be erased so do not choose to format.)
feature_bullets: 720 HD video capture; LUMIX Image Uploader makes it simple to share pictures on Facebook and video on YouTube
Panasonic iA mode makes it simple for anyone to take beautiful photos
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
